description: Users on Windows 10 Pro 22H2 are encountering a 'pending restart' message after accepting a pushed upgrade to Windows 11 22H2, despite previously selecting to remain on Windows 10. This situation arises when users do not reboot their machines, leaving the installation in a waiting state. The originating concern indicates a failure to respect user settings, leading to unwanted upgrades and operational delays as the user seeks solutions to revert back to their previous OS without completing the Windows 11 installation.
